document_data.mainbody:
Tabaxi was a language spoken by the Tabaxi tribe of humans in the jungles of Chult. It was a part of the Chultan language, and had its origin in Katashaka, a continent southwest of Faer√ªn and west of Zakhara.
* Dhalmass Rayburton, a multilinguist that preferred to speak Tabaxi over any other language.
